name: 1-Bit Gangster
description:
(This was made for the 1-Bit clicker game jam.)

Take on Bitville and become top gangster.

Features:

- Original pixelart

- 10 Original chiptune tracks made with beepbox.co

- random weather system (rain/sun)

- Fetch quests

Controls:

- Click and hold right mouse button to move

- Left click to interact

- Middle mouse button to pause/options
